item.title: 2015 In Review
item.description: Happy new year! ğŸŒŸ OK, I felt awkward starting a blog post that wayâ€”I confess. â˜ºï¸ But this is also an unusual postâ€”not an article about CSS or SVG, and not a lengthy tutorial about web development. It is also the quickest post I ever wrote. This is my first time writing a year in review kind of post. A lot of great stuff has happened in 2015 that I thought are worth documenting and have a look back at a few years from now.
